snippet: The last four Ebola patients were discharged Monday, meaning there were no more confirmed carriers of the deadly virus.
abstract: Liberian health officials discharge four Ebola patients from Monrovia clinic to cheers and applause; discharge means there are no more confirmed carriers of virus, which resurfaced in June after country was declared Ebola free in May; medical experts suspect sexual transmission of dormant virus caused June outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The last four Ebola patients were discharged Monday, meaning there were no more confirmed carriers of the deadly virus.

headline.main: Liberia: Ebola Patients Discharged, Last of the Country’s Latest Wave
headline.print_headline: Africa; Liberia: Ebola Patients Discharged, Last of the Country’s Latest Wave
